name: CAD v4 Ad-removal, site cleanup
description:
Removes a lot of the ads and ad boxes.
Then it removes the space those took up, and re-centers the narrower column.

No ill effects on any page as far as I could tell.

Enjoy the new CAD v4!
additional_info:
[UPDATE 2012/10/23]
 - Fixed broken background link that is now on CDN
